237a1(khri pa): rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa de nyid de'i lus la yang 'di lta ste/ rlung las gyur pa'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/ bad kan las gyur pa'am/ 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad gang yang rung ba zhig byung la/ de yang khri de las
237a2(khri pa): ldang bar 'dod pa dang / mi stobs dang ldan pa gnyis shig lhags nas/ glo g.yas g.yon nas brten te/ de la 'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur shog /khyod gar dga' ba dang / sems gar 'dod pa dang / gar dga' bar kho bo cag gis
237a3(khri pa): brten pas ji srid du gnas su ma phyin gyi bar du khyod 'gyel du dogs pa cung zad kyang mi 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag la dad pa dang / bzod pa dang / dang ba dang / lhag
237a4(khri pa): pa'i bsam pa dang / 'dod pa dang / mos pa dang / gtong ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang brtson pa mi gtong ba yod la/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba dang / thabs la mkhas
237a5(khri pa): pa dang ma bral ba yin na/ de'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rigs kyi bu de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
237a6(khri pa): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su zin par rig par bya
237a7(khri pa): ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bar ma do kho nar chos de dag las nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir
237a8(khri pa): zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di
237b1(khri pa): la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag kha cig dang po nyid du thabs la mi mkhas pas sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/ / de bzhin du thabs la mi mkhas pas tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa sgom par byed/ brtson
237b2(khri pa): 'grus rtsom par byed/ bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed/ thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab sgom par byed cing / de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed pa'o/ /sbyin pa ni
237b3(khri pa): 'di dag sbyin par bya'o/ /'di dag la ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag cag ni tshul khrims srung ba'o/ /bdag cag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bzod pa sgrub par byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bzod pa dang ldan
237b4(khri pa): pa'o/ /bdag cag ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/ /bdag cag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni shes rab
237b5(khri pa): sgom pa'o/ /bdag cag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du sems shing / de dag sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pa des rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pa la rlom sems su byed do/ / de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
237b6(khri pa): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab de rlom sems su byed/ shes rab des rlom sems su byed/ shes rab la rlom sems su byed do/ /de dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par ltung ba'i sbyin pa dang /
237b7(khri pa): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rnams kyis 'khor ba nyid rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /de dag ni skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dag las yongs su mi 'grol lo/ /
237b8(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de dag med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi
238a1(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir
238a2(khri pa): zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na/ dmigs pa'i pha mtha' mi shes na de dag sbyin pa'i
238a3(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgom pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa na dmigs pa'i pha mtha'
238a4(khri pa): mi shes na/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis yongs su ma zin na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma zin pa yin te/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi
238a5(khri pa): sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag thabs la mi mkhas pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la
238a6(khri pa): mkhas pa dag yin te/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dag dang po
238a7(khri pa): nyid du thabs la mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par ma lhung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed do/ /de bzhin du thabs la mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin par ma lhung ba'i
238a8(khri pa): sems kyis shes rab kyi bar du sgom par byed do/ /sbyin pa de dag sbyin pa na 'di snyam du bdag cag ni sbyin pa dag sbyin par byed pa'o/ /sbyin pa ni 'di dag sbyin par bya'o/ /slong ba 'di dag la ni sbyin par bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag cag ni tshul
238b1(khri pa): khrims srung bar byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bzod pa sgrub par byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni brtson
238b2(khri pa): 'grus dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog par byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag cag ni shes rab sgom par byed pa'o/ /bdag cag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam du mi sems te/ de dag ni sbyin pa de la rlom sems su mi
238b3(khri pa): byed/ sbyin pa des rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sbyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims de dang / bzod pa de dang / brtson 'grus de dang / bsam gtan de dag dang / shes
238b4(khri pa): rab de la rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab des rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ shes rab la rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
238b5(khri pa): rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ des na rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag med de/ des na rlom sems su mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
238b6(khri pa): 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar na de dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa
238b7(khri pa): ma yin pa mngon par shes pa dang / de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yang de bzhin te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis legs par yongs su zin pa'i
238b8(khri pa): phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid legs par yongs su zin pa yin no/ /legs par yongs su zin pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab
239a1(khri pa): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang kun tu 'dzin pa yin no/ /
239a2(khri pa): gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi lags/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
239a3(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar bslab par bgyi lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
239a4(khri pa): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
239a5(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam
239a6(khri pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsten par
239a7(khri pa): bya zhing bsnyen bkur bya'o/ / de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ston par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu tshur shog / sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang rung / de thams cad sems can
239a8(khri pa): thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig /khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de gzugs su ma rtog shig de bzhin du tshor
239b1(khri pa): ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes par ma rtog shig /de bzhin du tshul khrims gang ci srung yang rung / bzod pa gang ci sgom yang rung / brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom yang rung / bsam gtan gang ci la snyoms par 'jug
239b2(khri pa): kyang rung / shes rab gang ci sgom yang rung / de dag thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig /de bzhin du khyod bla na med pa yang
239b3(khri pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de gzugs su ma rtog shig / de bzhin du tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes par ma rtog shig /khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
239b4(khri pa): par ma rtog shig / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par ma rtog shig /de bzhin du bla na
239b5(khri pa): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag tu ma rtog shig /de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
239b6(khri pa): chub de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dag tu ma rtog shig /mngon par
239b7(khri pa): shes pa lnga dang / de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma rtog shig ces ston te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa nyid kyis
239b8(khri pa): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ snga ltas kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
240a1(khri pa): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
240a2(khri pa): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'tshal bas/ gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang
240a3(khri pa): dag par ston par bgyid pa dag dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
240a4(khri pa): pa ston pa dag 'di skad du/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog /khyod sems can rnams la sbyin pa gang ci gtong yang rung / de thams cad sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byos la/ de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na
240a5(khri pa): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig / khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig /khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
240a6(khri pa): chub de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rtog par ma byed cig /de
240a7(khri pa): bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las rtog par ma byed cig /de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par
240a8(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam las rtog par ma byed
240b1(khri pa): cig / de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma rtog cig /ces ston pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag bsten par bgyi zhing bsnyen par bgyi ba
240b2(khri pa): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
240b3(khri pa): rnams las mi rtog cing rnam par shes pa las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las mi rtog cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
240b4(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nang stong
240b5(khri pa): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
240b6(khri pa): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
240b7(khri pa): nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar las mi rtog na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
240b8(khri pa): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir yang dag par bstan pa la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di skad ces 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ kye rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi
241a1(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rigs kyi bu gzugs ni 'dod pa
241a2(khri pa): med cing / 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du kye rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
241a3(khri pa): pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dod pa ma skyed
241a4(khri pa): cig / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
241a5(khri pa): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'dod pa ma
241a6(khri pa): skyed cig / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu khyod rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de ci'i
241a7(khri pa): phyir zhe na/ kye rigs kyi bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'dod pa med pa dang / 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
241a8(khri pa): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'dod pa ma skyed cig /kye rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
241b1(khri pa): 'dod pa ma skyed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rigs kyi bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'dod pa med pa dang / 'dod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kye rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis
241b2(khri pa): stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid
241b3(khri pa): kyis stong pa'i chos rnams las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing / de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so/ /
241b4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams las bla na med pa yang
241b5(khri pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b6(khri pa): dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bur shes nas/ 'jig rten rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin te/
241b7(khri pa): bdag cag ni 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas dang / skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / gling dang / sgron ma 'dzin pa dang / 'od byed pa dang / ded dpon dang / yongs su 'dren pa dang / rten du 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bla na med pa yang
241b8(khri pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag 'jig rten rnams kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dag
242a1(khri pa): sbyin pa gang gtong ba de thams cad sems can rnams la sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir gtong ngo / / de bzhin du tshul khrims gang srung ba dang / bzod pa gang sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa dang /
242a2(khri pa): bsam gtan gang dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab gang sgom pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242a3(khri pa): chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi don du yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la phan par yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
242a4(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod la/ sems can thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
242a5(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la phan par yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa
242a6(khri pa): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la gnas la/ de'i 'og tu sems can gzhan rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la 'god par byed de/
242a7(khri pa): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams la bde ba'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas
242a8(khri pa): su gyur pa yin zhe na/ gnas par 'os pa'i phyir dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du phyin par byed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa yin no/ /
242b1(khri pa): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyob pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ngan song gsum du skyes pa dag mthong nas/ ngan song de
242b2(khri pa): dag nas skyob par byed cing / zhi ba'i gnas kyang yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'god par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na
242b3(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag rten med pa'i chos ston te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
242b4(khri pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la brten par mi byed la/ sems can de dag chos de thos nas skye ba dang / rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
242b5(khri pa): 'khrug pa dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi skyabs su 'os pa yin no// //
242b6(khri pa): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
242b7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag lam gyi rnam pa la mkhas pa dag dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la 'di skad du chos ston te/ gzugs kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba
242b8(khri pa): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du mig gi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi
243a1(khri pa): pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /
243a2(khri pa): de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i
243a3(khri pa): khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
243a4(khri pa): yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa'i pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi pha rol
243a5(khri pa): ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin
243a6(khri pa): du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin du thams cad
243a7(khri pa): shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol ni rtag tu 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
243a8(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mig gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi pha rol gang yin
243b1(khri pa): pa de ni yid ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de dag ni gzugs rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du mig gi
243b2(khri pa): khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du rna
243b3(khri pa): ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
243b4(khri pa): lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par
243b5(khri pa): shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du ma rig pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rga shi'i bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/
243b6(khri pa): rga shi ma yin no/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags
243b7(khri pa): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa
243b8(khri pa): brgyad kyi bar gyi pha rol gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad ma yin no/ /de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol gang
244a1(khri pa): yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /rab 'byor chos 'di dag gi pha rol ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de lta bu yin no/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi pha rol ji lta bar chos
244a2(khri pa): thams cad kyang de lta bu lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta na ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur ma lags sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom
244a3(khri pa): ldan 'das 'di ni gzugs so/ /'di ni tshor ba'o/ /'di ni 'du shes so/ /'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yin no snyam du gzugs kyi pha rol
244a4(khri pa): na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i pha rol dang / 'du shes kyi pha rol dang / 'du byed rnams kyi pha rol dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad
244a5(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi pha rol na/ rnam par rtog pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/ /rab 'byor 'di ni
244a6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dka' ba byed pa yin te/ chos 'di dag 'di ltar zhi ba 'di ltar zab pa la nges par sems kyang zhum par mi 'gyur te/ de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chos 'di dag mngon
244a7(khri pa): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ste/ de ltar bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ltar zab pa'i chos 'di dag sems can rnams la bstan par bya'o snyam du sems pa
244a8(khri pa): ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi dpung gnyen yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gling yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
244b1(khri pa): 'di lta ste dper na chu klung dag gam/ mtsho'am/ mtsho chen po dag gam/ rgya mtsho dag gis phyogs 'di dag chus kun tu chod pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni gling zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
244b2(khri pa): mtha' yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
244b3(khri pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /
244b4(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de kho na bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par khong du
244b5(khri pa): chud nas sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i chos yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa yin no/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
244b6(khri pa): yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba gya nom pa ji lta ba bzhin yin te/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / dmigs su med pa dang / lam yongs su chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa dang / 'dod chags dang
244b7(khri pa): bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi gling yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
244b8(khri pa): dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang / 'od byed pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dag gis de dag gi don de kho na la de kho nar rtogs nas de kho na bzhin du 'dzin cing / sems can rnams la yang ston la/
245a1(khri pa): sems can rnams kyang de yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud la rab tu 'god par byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin pa dang / 'od byed
245a2(khri pa): pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sems
245a3(khri pa): can lam ngan par zhugs pa 'gro ba ngan pa'i 'gro bar 'gro ba dag la/ sems can rnams rnam par dag par bya ba dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dag
245a4(khri pa): nub par bya ba dang / rigs pa'i chos rtogs par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam ston par byed do/ /de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
245a5(khri pa): par sangs rgyas nas gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
245a6(khri pa): rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
245a7(khri pa): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med par
245a8(khri pa): sems can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi ded dpon dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
245b1(khri pa): dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / snyan par
245b2(khri pa): smra ba dang / don spyod pa dang / don 'thun pas sems can rnams bsdus nas sems can de dag nyid la gzugs nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
245b3(khri pa): nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to/ /de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nam mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to/ /gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni stong pa nyid de/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong
245b4(khri pa): ba med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni stong pa nyid de de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la gang du yang
245b5(khri pa): 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni stong pa nyid de/ de ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la/ gang du yang 'gro ba med par sems can
245b6(khri pa): rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
245b7(khri pa): pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong
245b8(khri pa): ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
246a1(khri pa): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
246a2(khri pa): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
246a3(khri pa): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / sprul pa'i tshul can
246a4(khri pa): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / sprul pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci
246a5(khri pa): yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbri ba
246a6(khri pa): med pa dang / bsnan pa med pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las
246a7(khri pa): mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni blang du med pa dang / dor du med pa'i bar gyi tshul can te/
246a8(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor blang du med pa dang / dor du med pa la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
246b1(khri pa): 'dre ba med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dre ba med pa la 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams
246b2(khri pa): cad ni bdag med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bdag la ni 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba ci yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar na gong ma
246b3(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni sems can med pa dang / skye ba po med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang / shed las skyes pa med pa dang / shed bu med pa dang / slong ba po med pa dang / kun nas
246b4(khri pa): slong ba po med pa dang / byed pa po med pa dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i tshul can te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
246b5(khri pa): bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang /
246b6(khri pa): shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul can dang / sdug bsngal
246b7(khri pa): ba'i tshul can dang / bdag gi tshul can dang / bdag med pa'i tshul can dang / stong pa'i tshul can dang / mi stong pa'i tshul can dang / mtshan ma'i tshul can dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul can dang / smon pa'i tshul can dang / smon pa med pa'i tshul can dang /
246b8(khri pa): zhi ba'i tshul can dang / dben pa'i tshul can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshul can dang / rnam par byang ba'i tshul can dang / skye ba'i tshul can dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul can dang / 'gag pa'i tshul can dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul can dang / dngos po'i
247a1(khri pa): tshul can dang / dngos po med pa'i tshul can dang / sdug pa'i tshul can dang / mi sdug pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / bdag dang / sdug pa'i bar du gtan med cing
247a2(khri pa): mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi gzhi can dang / zhe sdang gi gzhi can dang / gti mug gi gzhi can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir
247a3(khri pa): zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi gzhi dang / zhe sdang gi gzhi dang / gti mug gi gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi can te/
247a4(khri pa): tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshul can
247a5(khri pa): dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dang /
247a6(khri pa): chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos mnyam pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni
247a7(khri pa): g.yo ba med pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang 'gro ba'am/ 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i g.yo ba nyid gang yang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul
247a8(khri pa): can no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshor ba'i tshul can dang / 'du shes kyi tshul can dang / 'du byed rnams kyi tshul can dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
247b1(khri pa): gzugs med cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad
247b2(khri pa): ni sbyin pa'i tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khrims kyi tshul can dang /
247b3(khri pa): bzod pa'i tshul can dang / brtson 'grus kyi tshul can dang / bsam gtan gyi tshul can dang / shes rab kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson
247b4(khri pa): 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
247b5(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid
247b6(khri pa): gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshul can dang / de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul
247b7(khri pa): can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar
247b8(khri pa): gzhag pa'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag
248a1(khri pa): gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
248a2(khri pa): ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /
248a3(khri pa): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i tshul can no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
248a4(khri pa): tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
248a5(khri pa): rang sangs rgyas nyid med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/ tshul de las mi 'da'o/ /
248a6(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag gi 'gro ba'am/ 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
248a7(khri pa): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab mo 'di la su dag mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang
248a8(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad pa dag dang / sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed
248b1(khri pa): pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
248b2(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid de ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi rtags ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/
248b3(khri pa): mtshan ma ni ci 'dra ba zhig /dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches
248b4(khri pa): shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dul ba yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing
248b5(khri pa): mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi rtags dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kyi dben pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
248b6(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can du 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag
248b7(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
248b8(khri pa): gang dag 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa sgom pa dag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
249a1(khri pa): pa de ni/ chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa lags la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa yang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
249a2(khri pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad gang dag rnam par 'jig pa yin/ gsol pa/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
249a3(khri pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / khams bcwa brgyad rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bdag dang / sems can
249a4(khri pa): dang / skye ba po dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / shes pa po dang /
249a5(khri pa): mthong ba po rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
249a6(khri pa): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi
249a7(khri pa): stong pa nyid nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag pa'i spong
249a8(khri pa): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/
249b1(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
249b2(khri pa): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'jig
249b3(khri pa): pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa'o/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/
249b4(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ mig rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /
249b5(khri pa): de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ gzugs rnams rnam par
249b6(khri pa): 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
249b7(khri pa): de ni mig gi khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /
249b8(khri pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
250a1(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i
250a2(khri pa): khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par
250a3(khri pa): 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
250a4(khri pa): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /
250a5(khri pa): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
250a6(khri pa): pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'jig pa yin no/ /de nas
250a7(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
250a8(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las phyir
250b1(khri pa): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas nye bar brtag par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
250b2(khri pa): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad
250b3(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ gzhan gyis smras pa'i tshig dag la snying po med pa dang / de kho na ma
250b4(khri pa): yin par khong du chud par byed de/ gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'o/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang / sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /
250b5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
250b6(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/
250b7(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum mi 'gong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
250b8(khri pa): byang chub las yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ kun chub par byed pa nas/ tshul bzhin du
251a1(khri pa): yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa dang / de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni
251a2(khri pa): sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dri ba byas pa dang / bzung ba dang / kun chub par byas pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang
251a3(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum mi 'gong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las de'i yid phyir
251a4(khri pa): ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ kun chub par byed pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
251a5(khri pa): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ mi zhum mi 'gong ste/
251a6(khri pa): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa nas/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid pa'i byang chub
251a7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ji ltar spyad par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par
251a8(khri pa): bya'o/ /gsol pa/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa
251b1(khri pa): dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o/ /de bzhin du nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
251b2(khri pa): par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba dang /
251b3(khri pa): chos mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang / de bzhin du sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / sprul pa la
251b4(khri pa): gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
251b5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu
251b6(khri pa): dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzugs
251b7(khri pa): la spyod pa lags sam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod pa lags sam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
251b8(khri pa): stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni gzugs la spyod pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor
252a1(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni sus kyang ma byas/
252a2(khri pa): 'gyur bar yang ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang ma song / gang la yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ phyogs na yang mi gnas te/ de la ni grangs dang / rtsis kyang mi gnas mi dmigs so/ /gang la grangs dang / rtsis mi dmigs pa de ni
252a3(khri pa): sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa'am/ sbyin pa'am/ tshul khrims sam/ bzod pa'am/ brtson 'grus sam/ bsam gtan dag gam/
252a4(khri pa): shes rab bam/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
252a5(khri pa): de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
252a6(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
252a7(khri pa): nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i
252a8(khri pa): de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/ de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /
252b1(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las bsgom pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dag gis lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dag dang / rgya spos dang / ta la'i lo ma'i
252b2(khri pa): phye ma dag dang / lha'i ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
252b3(khri pa): phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rtogs par
252b4(khri pa): dka' ba/ brtag par mi nus pa/ rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags pa/ zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bgyi ba lags pa dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
252b5(khri pa): 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags te/ 'di ltar gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so/ /
252b6(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste/ gzugs kyi de
252b7(khri pa): bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
252b8(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /'di ltar mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
253a1(khri pa): pa nyid mig lags so/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te/ mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams
253a2(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa
253a3(khri pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams
253a4(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs rnams lags so/ /de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chos rnams lags so/ /'di ltar gzugs kyi de
253a5(khri pa): bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid rnam pa
253a6(khri pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig gi khams lags te/ mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni
253a7(khri pa): gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /'di ltar gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
253a8(khri pa): dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i
253b1(khri pa): khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te/ de ltar na
253b2(khri pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /
253b3(khri pa): de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams lags so/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba gang lags pa dag dang /
253b4(khri pa): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam
253b5(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lags te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de
253b6(khri pa): bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang dag lags pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/ rnam pa thams
253b7(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lags so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
253b8(khri pa): bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/ gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha dag de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa
254a1(khri pa): de de bzhin te/ gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / de bzhin du 'du shes dang / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes
254a2(khri pa): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/
254a3(khri pa): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid
254a4(khri pa): de/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/
254a5(khri pa): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /lha dag don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni thugs kyi phrin las chung ba la gzhol bar mdzad kyi chos ston pa la ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dag
254a6(khri pa): kye ma chos 'di ni zab ste/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag par mi nus pa/ zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas
254a7(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa yin te/ de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ gang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ gang du yang mngon par rdzogs
254a8(khri pa): par sangs ma rgyas te/ lha dag 'di ni gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba yang med pa'i chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /lha dag nam mkha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir
254b1(khri pa): dang / chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba
254b2(khri pa): med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du bdag zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i
254b3(khri pa): bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du gzugs zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du
254b4(khri pa): mig zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag gzugs rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du sgra dang /
254b5(khri pa): dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /rna ba'i khams
254b6(khri pa): dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de
254b7(khri pa): bzhin du lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir
254b8(khri pa): chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / tshul khrims kyi pha
255a1(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du nang stong pa
255a2(khri pa): nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
255a3(khri pa): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
255a4(khri pa): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang /
255a5(khri pa): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos
255a6(khri pa): 'di zab bo/ /lha dag de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
255a7(khri pa): lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa'i chos 'di bstan to/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs
255a8(khri pa): gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du
255b1(khri pa): mig gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ gzugs rnams gzung ba'am/ mi
255b2(khri pa): gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang /
255b3(khri pa): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan
255b4(khri pa): pa ma lags/ lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
255b5(khri pa): gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du
255b6(khri pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
255b7(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ phyi stong pa nyid dang /
255b8(khri pa): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
256a1(khri pa): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
256a2(khri pa): gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang
256a3(khri pa): po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba'am/ mi
256a4(khri pa): gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
256a5(khri pa): 'das de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang
256a6(khri pa): chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'am/ mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gzugs so/ /de bzhin du bdag tshor ba'o/ /bdag 'du shes so/ /
256a7(khri pa): bdag 'du byed rnams so/ /bdag gi 'du byed rnams so/ /bdag rnam par shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du bdag mig go/ bdag gi mig go/ bdag rna ba'o/ /bdag gi rna ba'o/ /sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin
256a8(khri pa): du bdag cag ni gzugs rnams so/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /bdag cag chos rnams so/ /bdag cag gi chos rnams so/ /mig gi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
256b1(khri pa): kyang de bzhin no/ /de bzhin du bdag rna ba'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lce'i khams dang / ro'i khams dang /
256b2(khri pa): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / lus kyi khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /bdag gi yid kyi rnam
256b3(khri pa): par shes pa'o/ /de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
256b4(khri pa): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa
256b5(khri pa): nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
256b6(khri pa): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / bdag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /bdag cag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /
256b7(khri pa): de bzhin du bdag cag yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /bdag cag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /de bzhin
256b8(khri pa): du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad kyi bar dag go/ /de bzhin du bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
257a1(khri pa): nas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i bar dag go/ bdag rang byang chub bo/ /bdag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bdag tu
257a2(khri pa): 'dzin pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod pa lags so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces
